wpPage.content: JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJjdXN0b20taC1ydWxlJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNFTripleLift is pioneering a solution that provides networks and streaming services scalable, post-production brand integration into TV shows. This requires no additional resources from show producers, will introduce impression-level dynamic delivery of product placement and lead to the sustainability of brand-supported television.
